text:
Hi ! Has anyone successfully implemented Review & Rating and Favourite Videos need your help on your approach   “For Video on Demand Fitness application we are building on CMS Hub Enterprise “
Challenge: We might have 50k+ users for this application.
HubDB or Custom Objects which way would be preferable.
Anyone already successfully implemented it.
We successfully implemented Google + Facebook Signup too. Happy to share our approach how we did it. TIA
